author: Not2early Nicky
content: April for me means beautiful blossom shortlived due to wind and showers; and pale pink magnolia trees in bloom now remind me of the stillborn daughter I lost eight years ago on Monday. Our neigbour opposite had a magnolia in full bloom at the time, though they have since replaced their front garden with total tarmac. Its not too sad though, I have 2 other beautiful children :0)
